# restrictions

**Instance Property**

The restrictions the event imposes on the playback of interstitial content.

## Declaration

```swift
var restrictions: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions { get set }
```

## Managing restrictions

- **AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions**: Constants that define restrictions on the playback of interstitial content.
